repliclust.maxmin.blueprint¶

This module implements a blueprint for mixture models. The user chooses the desired geometry by setting the ratios between largest and smallest values of various geometric parameters.

Functions

parse_distribution_selection(distributions)

Parse user selection of probability distributions and reformat it as an input for constructing a FixedProportionMix object.

validate_blueprint_args(**args)

Validate all provided arguments for a MaxMinBlueprint.

validate_maxmin_ratios([maxmin_ratio, ...])

Check that a max-min ratio is >= 1.

validate_overlaps([max_overlap, min_overlap])

Note that we allow max_overlap=1 and min_overlap=0, which should have the effect of removing one or both overlap constraints.

validate_reference_quantity([ref_qty, ...])

Check that a reference value exceeds its minimum allowed value.

Classes

MaxMinBlueprint([n_clusters, dim, ...])

A blueprint for mixture models.
